name: Nelly Uchendu
description: '''Nelly Uzonna Edith Uchendu,''' [[Order of the Niger|MON]] (1950 {{ndash}} 12 April 2005), was a Nigerian [[singer]], composer and actress. Revered for modernising traditional [[Igbo people|Igbo]] folk music, Uchendu rose to prominence upon the release of her 1976 song "[https://music.apple.com/us/album/love-nwantiti-feat-mike-obianwu/784492370 Love Nwantinti]" which earned her the "Lady with the Golden Voice" sobriquet. She released 6 [[LP record]]ings during her career.
